particleengine

Class IEmitter

  • java.lang.Object
    • particleengine.IEmitter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BaseIEmitter, Emitter

    public abstract class IEmitter
extends java.lang.Object
    Emitter interface. Extend to make custom particle emitters.

        public IEmitter()

    • Method Detail

      • getLocation

        public abstract org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector2f getLocation()
        Returns:
        Absolute location of this emitter, in world coordinates.

      • getSprite

        public abstract com.fs.starfarer.api.graphics.SpriteAPI getSprite()
        Returns:
        Sprite that particles from this emitter will have. Can be null, in which a default particle will be used.

      • getXDir

        public abstract float getXDir()
        Returns:
        Angle, in degrees, that this emitter's x-axis faces. If 0, then this emitter's axes coincides with global axes (x-axis facing to the right).

      • getBlendSourceFactor

        public abstract int getBlendSourceFactor()
        Returns:
        Source blend factor, e.g. GL11.GL_SRC_ALPHA.

      • getBlendDestinationFactor

        public abstract int getBlendDestinationFactor()
        Returns:
        Destination blend factor, e.g. GL11.GL_ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA.

      • getBlendFunc

        public abstract int getBlendFunc()
        Returns:
        Blending operation, e.g. GL14.GL_FUNC_ADD.

      • getLayer

        public abstract com.fs.starfarer.api.combat.CombatEngineLayers getLayer()
        Returns:
        Layer particles should be rendered on.

      • getRenderRadius

        public abstract float getRenderRadius()
        Returns:
        Distance from edge of screen beyond which particles are culled before generation. This applies to the emitter's location rather than individual particles' locations.

      • enableDynamicAnchoring

        public final void enableDynamicAnchoring()
        Sets a flag that will allow particles generated by this emitter to dynamically follow its motion.

      • disableDynamicAnchoring

        public final void disableDynamicAnchoring()
